query: Does AWS D1.1:2025 change the visual inspection hold time requirement after welding completion?
expected_answer: Yes, Clause 6.5.3 clarifies minimum delay before visual inspection to allow for hydrogen diffusion
rationale: Clause 6.5.3 in D1.1:2025 clarifies the visual inspection hold time requirement (typically 48 hours for certain high-strength steels) to allow hydrogen diffusion and prevent delayed cracking. This update addresses field inspection scheduling and ensures CWIs understand the timing requirement for final acceptance.
